calibration¶

Demos¶

  • Basic auto-centering and calibration (notebook)

API¶

Automatically calibrate a diffraction beam line given a powder sample of a known sample.

estimate_d_blind

Estimate the sample-detector distance

refine_center

Refines the location of the center of the beam.
